subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: James Smith and Jared Jordan each scored 24 points yesterday to lead Marist to a 98-88 overtime victory against visiting Siena, giving the Red Foxes their first MAAC regular-season championship.
snippet: James Smith and Jared Jordan each scored 24 points yesterday to lead Marist to a 98-88 overtime victory against visiting Siena, giving the Red Foxes their first MAAC regular-season championship.
